#          docker network create --driver=bridge --subnet="192.168.0.0/16" "k3d-action-bridge-network"
#          curl --silent --fail https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rancher/k3d/main/install.sh | TAG=v4.4.6 bash
#          k3d cluster create k3d-action --wait --agents 1 --no-lb --network=192.168.0.0/16
